info.name: Unclutter NUpdates
info.description: Makes Novel Updates more touch-screen friendly (for logged in users).
info.additionalInfo:
Optimized for the Dark style, "Disabled Discussion Links" & "Disabled Shorten Titles" set in NUpdates user settings. 

Features:
- Sidebar fixed to the right
- Release page,'Group' column changed to 'Read' column to save space, Double size of read checkbox
